item.title: About
item.description: I’m a first-year master @Fudan DISC, advised by Zhongyu Wei. Previously, I was a research intern @XLANG, supervised by Tao Yu. I earned my bachelor’s degree from @Beijing Institute of Technology. My primary research interests are Natural Language Processing and Artificial Intelligence. My works focus on advancing the capabilities of large language models and their applications in complex tasks, e.g., code generation, with a particular emphasis on evaluation and alignment.

item.title: 🥰Friends😋
item.description: Mengyu Bu Yifan Li Yuandong Pu Ruiqiao Qiu I spent a wonderful summer with them in Kunming, 2022 Tianbao Xie Chengxi Li Yiming Wang Shuyang Jiang Hongjin Su

item.title: Where Are We Going?
item.description: ChatGPT和GPT-4的出现给NLP从业者带来的影响是巨大的，我在知乎上看到了一个有趣的观点。

item.title: The Last Night
item.description: 现在是北京时间凌晨3:30，我和舍友正在通宵收拾行李，准备在凌晨5:00的时候坐班车离开学校。
